body.p: In its redeliberations, the IFRIC noted that the use of the step‑by‑step method of consolidation does create such a difference for an individual foreign operation although the aggregate net amount of foreign currency translation reserve for all the foreign operations is the same under either method of consolidation. At the same time, the IFRIC noted that the method of consolidation should not create such a difference for an individual foreign operation, on the basis of its conclusion that the economic risk is determined in relation to the ultimate parent’s functional currency.
